name: illustrator-quote-plugin
description: Adobe Illustrator CEP plugin for material quoting and pricing

scripts.prepare-cep: cp -r CSXS jsx lib dist/ && cp index-cep.html dist/index.html
scripts.copy-files: cp -r CSXS jsx lib dist/ && cp index-cep.html dist/index.html
scripts.create-zxp: echo 'ZXP packaging requires Adobe Extension Builder or ZXPSignCmd'
scripts.copy-to-extensions: echo 'Copy dist folder to CEP extensions directory'

author: Your Name
